description: Easter is a time for family, friends, and of course, cocktails. If you're looking for a special drink to serve at your Easter celebration, look no further than the Spiked Sparkling Basil Lemonade. The drink is made with basil-infused&nbsp;vodka, which brings out the sweetness of the herb and turns the spirit a vibrant, springy green. The&nbsp;lemonade is also spiked with a hint of lime, making it tart and refreshing.Additionally, the drink is garnished with a sprig of fresh basil, adding a beautiful botanical touch. This drink is perfect for sipping on a warm spring day or for enjoying at a&nbsp;party or gathering.
